original_text: So your beautiful valleys were full of chariots. Soldiers on horses prepared to attack your city's gates.
korean_text: 병거는 네 아름다운 골짜기에 가득하였고 마병은 성문에 정렬되었도다

sentences.original_text: So your beautiful valleys were full of chariots.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신의 아름다운 계곡들은 전차들로 가득 찼습니다.

sentences.original_text: Soldiers on horses prepared to attack
